author: gstein
msg: Big revmap to streamline the resource handling: unify dir_baton/file_baton;
toss add_resource; introduce add_child; checkout_resource() takes a resource
rather than a URL (and other simplifications); revise all/most editor
callbacks for new checkout_resource and baton construction; pick up VR URLs
